TopicTitle: General question to Squad about Breaking Ground

Articles.Content:
I was recently made aware of the power mechanic in the Breaking Ground parts (ie:  yesterday).  

I have not been able to understand why a new power mechanism was created for these parts only. 

Why not just use the existing ElectricCharge (EC)?

And another one:  Why is the field    powerNeeded  a string?

This whole thing seems to have been very poorly thought out.
